definitions.definition: An online community of individuals, centered around the forum LessWrong and the blog Slate Star Codex , who discuss philosophy , psychology , and futurism through the lens of Bayesianism and rationality .

main_definition: ( preceded with the ) An online community of individuals, centered around the forum LessWrong and the blog Slate Star Codex , who discuss philosophy , psychology , and futurism through the lens of Bayesianism and rationality .
